Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Grand Hotel Villa Politi in Syracuse, you'll be minutes from Capuchin Quarry and close to Museo Archeologico Regionale Paolo Orsi. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Santa Lucia al Sepolcro Basilica and Piazza Santa Lucia.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and minibars. Satellite television is provided for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have bidets and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and complimentary newspapers, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a seasonal outdoor pool, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and wedding services.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and meeting rooms. Guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle for a surcharge, and free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 10 AM
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Grand Hotel Villa Politi in Syracuse, you'll be minutes from Capuchin Quarry and close to Museo Archeologico Regionale Paolo Orsi. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Santa Lucia al Sepolcro Basilica and Piazza Santa Lucia.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Capuchin Quarry - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Santa Lucia al Sepolcro Basilica - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Piazza Santa Lucia - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Museo Archeologico Regionale Paolo Orsi - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Papyrus Museum - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Catacombs of St. John - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Madonna delle Lacrime - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Porto Piccolo - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Antico Mercato - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Roman Amphitheatre - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Syracuse Forum Ruins - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
San Nicolo dei Cordari - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Temple of Apollo - 1.5 km / 1 mi
Rope-makers' Cave - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Altar of Hieron II - 1.6 km / 1 mi

The preferred airport for Grand Hotel Villa Politi is Catania (CTA-Fontanarossa) - 48.1 km / 29.9 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
